name: Boris Brodsky
title: Digital Transformation and Innovation | Lifetime Learner | Ex-Auranda/Accenture | Sitecore Technology MVP dsfsdf
about:
Boris Brodsky is a seasoned technology leader with over 20 years of driving enterprise digital transformation, innovation, and strategy. He specializes in cloud solutions, data analytics, and digital experience platforms. Mr. Brodsky is responsible for leading teams to deliver cutting-edge solutions that enhance business operations and customer engagement. Based in Maryland, he is recognized for his expertise in digital strategy and innovation. 

Prior to his current endeavors, Mr. Brodsky served as Head of Data, Insights and Analytics at Zonet Digital, where he led data strategy and solution architecture for enterprise customers. From 2015 to 2021, he was the AVP of Digital at Auranda, focusing on cloud architecture and digital transformation. Earlier in his career, he held roles such as Director of Technology Leadership at Accenture, Digital Application Architect, and Group Manager at Sitecore Architect, where he contributed to the development of Sitecore DXP solutions and cloud computing strategies. 

Mr. Brodsky holds a Master of Science in Information Technology from Towson University, where he also earned a Bachelor of Science in Database Management. He is a Sitecore Technology MVP and has obtained certifications such as the Sitecore 10 .NET Developer Certification and AWS Certified Data Engineer - Associate. Fluent in Hebrew, he actively participates in professional communities and continues to drive innovation in the technology sector.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology
Bachelor of Science in Database Management
